description: As a midlayer in their VentureLayer system or worn on its own, this versatile fleece pullover provides warmth with the performance of four-way stretch. Brushed fleece combines with stretch-woven face for durability outside, soft comfort in. Multiple pockets provide storage – the entire fleece packs into its back pocket – and its design integrates with other VentureLayer pieces to create a system that keeps you warm, protected, and dry on the move.
name: Royal Robbins Venturelayer Fleece 1/4 Zip - Mens
